title: Analysis of English Learner Assessment Policies and Improvement Strategy Design

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of Basic Education Policies, Experience Operating Assessment Tools, Awareness of English Learner Support Programs
context.additional_context: For mathematics practitioners, focusing on improving fairness and effectiveness of English learner assessment policies

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and explain the legal basis and operational procedures of English learner assessment policies
Learners can critically evaluate the limitations of assessment tools similar to W-APT through case studies
Learners can propose customized assessment improvement plans for learners with diverse literacy levels
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
